constructor.param: Initial color (in #XXXXXX format, where X are hexadecimal digits)
constructor.doc:
A specialization of 〈DlButtonMenu〉 suitable for selecting a color. Internally it uses a widget with the same API as 〈DlColorPickerHSV〉 (note that it's not required to be of that exact type, as exemplified by our compound widgets sample).
Triggers the "onSelect" event (see 〈DlButtonMenu|base class〉) when a color is selected.

method.name: getColorElement
method.doc: Returns the DIV element that displays the current color.

method.name: getLabelElement
method.doc: Returns the element where the label is displayed.

method.name: setColorPicker
method.doc: Sets the color picker drop-down element for this button. While it is not enforced, this widget should be an instance of 〈DlColorPickerHSV〉, or a widget that sports a similar API.

method.name: setLabel
method.doc: Changes the label of this button.
